_sText:
The Idea:
one day i had the idea of a map where many parts of the map rotate. i told the idea to my classmate Nexus and he was interested in mapping a map because of my idea. but only for himself... :)
i wanted to map a map, too, but i worked at another map and wanted to finish it first.

so we tested Nexus' map, the FIRST rotating map ever, and we were surprised what a fun it was to play on it.
then i finished my project and mapped THIS map, the FIRST OFFICAL, but the second INOFFICAL map.

Nexus will finish his map as soon as he can, because at first he dind't want to upload it here. then i will upload it on FPSbanana, too.

now to my map:

Players: max. 16 spawns

specials:

-prison, which can be opened at the sniper tower
-teleporter
-secret room
-sniper weapon on the top of the sniper tower in the middle 
- 2 BuyZones: one at every spawn point and the second is above the ENEMY spawn ;D

have fun and i hope u will like the style of the map
i'm looking forward to ro_maps of YOU! 

here is a vid (sry 4 low quality):  http://youtube.com/watch?v=wJu0pVGyi7Q
